languages.text: [Протянуть кубок Соломону] "Уважим хозяев праздника, выпьем на брудершафт?"
[Hand the cup to Solomorne] "Let us give our hosts their due and raise a toast to companionship, shall we? Let us lock our arms together and seal this solemn ritual with a kiss!"
languages.original_text: [Протянуть кубок Соломону] "Уважим хозяев праздника, выпьем на брудершафт?"

traits.locale_text: [Hand the cup to Solomorne] "Let us give our hosts their due and raise a toast to friendship, shall we?"
[Hand the cup to Solomorne] "Let us give our hosts their due and raise a toast to friendship, shall we?"
[Hand the cup to Solomorne] "Let us give our hosts their due and raise a toast to friendship, shall we?"
[Hand the cup to Solomorne] "Let us give our hosts their due and raise a toast to companionship, shall we? Let us lock our arms together and seal this solemn ritual with a kiss!"
[Hand the cup to Solomorne] "Let us give our hosts their due and raise a toast to companionship, shall we? Let us lock our arms together and seal this solemn ritual with a kiss!"

languages.text: [Solomorne den Becher reichen] "Bieten wir unseren Gastgebern etwas und trinken auf die Freundschaft, ja? Verschränken wir unsere Arme und besiegeln wir dieses feierliche Ritual mit einem Kuss!"
languages.original_text: [Hand the cup to Solomorne] "Let us give our hosts their due and raise a toast to companionship, shall we? Let us lock our arms together and seal this solemn ritual with a kiss!"

traits.locale_text: [Solomorne den Becher reichen] "Bieten wir unseren Gastgebern etwas und trinken auf die Freundschaft, ja? Verschränken wir unsere Arme und besiegeln wir dieses feierliche Ritual mit einem Kuss!"

languages.text: [Donner la coupe à Solomorne] « Trinquons à la camaraderie pour faire plaisir à nos hôtes, d'accord ? Prenons-nous par le bras et scellons ce rituel solennel par un baiser ! »
languages.original_text: [Hand the cup to Solomorne] "Let us give our hosts their due and raise a toast to companionship, shall we? Let us lock our arms together and seal this solemn ritual with a kiss!"

traits.locale_text: [Donner la coupe à Solomorne] « Trinquons à la camaraderie pour faire plaisir à nos hôtes, d'accord ? Prenons-nous par le bras et scellons ce rituel solennel par un baiser ! »

languages.text: [ソロモーンに杯を渡す]「ここは主催者たちに敬意を表して、友情に乾杯といこうじゃないか？腕を組み交わし、この厳かな儀式をキスで締めくくろう！」
languages.original_text: [Hand the cup to Solomorne] "Let us give our hosts their due and raise a toast to companionship, shall we? Let us lock our arms together and seal this solemn ritual with a kiss!"

traits.locale_text: [ソロモーンに杯を渡す]「ここは主催者たちに敬意を表して、友情に乾杯といこうじゃないか？腕を組み交わし、この厳かな儀式をキスで締めくくろう！」

languages.text: [Entregar la copa a Solomorne] «Demos a nuestros anfitriones lo que merecen y brindemos por la buena compañía. ¡Entrelacemos los brazos y sellemos este solemne ritual con un beso!».
languages.original_text: [Hand the cup to Solomorne] "Let us give our hosts their due and raise a toast to companionship, shall we? Let us lock our arms together and seal this solemn ritual with a kiss!"

traits.locale_text: [Entregar la copa a Solomorne] «Demos a nuestros anfitriones lo que merecen y brindemos por la buena compañía. ¡Entrelacemos los brazos y sellemos este solemne ritual con un beso!».

languages.text: [将酒杯递给索罗蒙]“让我们接受主人的邀请，为友谊干杯，怎么样？不如这样吧！我们挽起手来，以一个吻来结束这场庄严的仪式！”
languages.original_text: [Hand the cup to Solomorne] "Let us give our hosts their due and raise a toast to companionship, shall we? Let us lock our arms together and seal this solemn ritual with a kiss!"

traits.locale_text: [将酒杯递给索罗蒙]“让我们接受主人的邀请，为友谊干杯，怎么样？不如这样吧！我们挽起手来，以一个吻来结束这场庄严的仪式！”

languages.text: [Kadehi Solomorne'a uzat] "Bizi ağırlayan ev sahiplerimizin âdetlerine uyalım da yoldaşlığımıza kadeh kaldıralım. Kollarımızı dolayıp bu kutsal ayini bir öpücükle mühürleyelim!"
languages.original_text: [Hand the cup to Solomorne] "Let us give our hosts their due and raise a toast to companionship, shall we? Let us lock our arms together and seal this solemn ritual with a kiss!"

traits.locale_text: [Kadehi Solomorne'a uzat] "Ev sahiplerinin âdetlerine uyalım da yoldaşlığımıza kadeh kaldıralım hadi. Kollarımızı dolayıp bu kutsal ayini bir öpücükle mühürleyelim!"
